docs.title: 👋 Welcome to My Portfolio
docs.text: Hi, I’m Muhammad Usman 🌱🤖 I’m passionate about Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, and AI-driven Plant Breeding. This portfolio showcases my projects, skills, and learning journey as I explore how AI can solve real-world problems.

docs.title: 🌐 Explore My Work
docs.text: For complete documentation, code, and projects, visit my GitHub repository: 🔗 My GitHub Portfolio

docs.title: 📁 Project Structure
docs.text:
Below is the basic structure of this portfolio website built using MkDocs:

```text Muhammad-Usman-portfolio/ │ ├── mkdocs.yml # Configuration file └── docs/ └── index.md # Home page of the site

docs.title: Professional Background 🌾
docs.text: I am a Scientific Officer specializing in pulse crop improvement at PBG Gram Breeding Research Sub-Station, Kalur Kot (Bhakkar). With a strong foundation in agricultural science, I combine traditional breeding expertise with modern computational approaches to drive innovation in crop improvement.

docs.title: Core Expertise 💡
docs.text:
• 🔬 Agricultural Research & Development: Designing and implementing breeding trials with precision and rigor
  • 🌱 Plant Breeding: Specialized in pulse crop genetics and trait selection for yield and resilience
  • 📊 Data Analysis & Programming: Proficient in R programming for statistical analysis and data visualization
  • ✍️ Scientific Communication: Skilled in translating complex research findings into clear, impactful scientific writing
  • 🤖 AI & Data Science: Actively advancing expertise in machine learning and predictive analytics to revolutionize breeding strategies

docs.title: Research Focus 🎯
docs.text: My work centers on leveraging data-driven approaches to enhance crop productivity and sustainability. I am passionate about integrating artificial intelligence with traditional breeding methods to accelerate the development of improved varieties that meet future agricultural demands.

docs.title: Vision 🚀
docs.text: To bridge the gap between conventional agricultural research and cutting-edge technology, creating smarter breeding strategies that maximize yield, disease resistance, and environmental sustainability for farmers. I aim to leverage AI learning and machine learning technologies to continuously improve breeding methodologies and deliver innovative solutions to modern agricultural challenges. 🌍✨

docs.title: 👤 Professional Summary
docs.text: I am a Scientific Officer specializing in pulse crop improvement, with hands-on experience in plant breeding, field experimentation, and agricultural research. With a strong academic background and growing expertise in AI, data science, and statistical programming, I aim to integrate modern computational approaches into traditional breeding systems to accelerate crop improvement and sustainability.

docs.title: 🎓 My Journey in Tech & AI 🇵🇰
docs.text:
Zindagi ka safar hamesha seedha nahi hota — lekin seekhna kabhi band nahi hota 💪

🏫 Maine apni parhai UAF (University of Agriculture Faisalabad) se ki, jahan se mujhe agriculture aur research ki strong foundation mili 🌾 Iske baad 🔬 NIAB Faisalabad mein research ka practical experience hasil kiya, jahan maine field work, experiments aur data ke sath kaam karna seekha.

📊 Research ke dauran mujhe ehsaas hua ke data aur technology future ka key hoga — yahin se mera interest analytical aur computational skills ki taraf barhta gaya.

🏢 Phir PPSC ke zariye job hasil ki aur ab main Scientific Officer ke taur par GBRSS Kalur Kot (Bhakkar) mein apni services de raha hoon 👨‍🔬

docs.title: 💪 Learning Never Stops
docs.text: Job ke sath sath main apni skills improve karne par bhi focus karta hoon. Naye naye projects, self-learning aur experimentation meri routine ka hissa hain 🚀 Mera maanna hai ke agar aap grow karna chahte ho to comfort zone se bahar nikalna zaroori hai 🔥

docs.title: 🤖 AI & Data Science — New Passion
docs.text:
🧠 Ab mera dil Artificial Intelligence aur Data Science ki taraf bohat zyada inclined hai. 💻 Main chahata hoon ke AI ko Plant Breeding & Agriculture ke sath integrate karke real-world problems solve karun 🌱🤖

📚 Isi journey ke dauran main Codanics ke online program

docs.title: 🎯 AI KA CHILLA 2026
docs.text:
ka hissa bana, jo Dr. Ammar Tufail 👨‍🏫 aur unki amazing team ne design kiya hai.

Is course ne mujhe: - 🤖 AI ka strong base - 📊 Data Science ki understanding - 🧠 Problem-solving mindset

develop karne mein bohat madad ki.

docs.title: 🚀 Aage Kya?
docs.text:
Yeh blog meri learning journey, projects aur experiences ka record hoga. Yahan aap dekhein ge: - 📌 AI & Data Science projects - 🌱 Agriculture + AI ideas - 📊 Data analysis insights - 💡 Lessons learned from mistakes

⭐ Stay tuned for more updates — bohat kuch aane wala hai! 🚀🔥

docs.title: 🌱 Chickpea PARB (Chana) Research Project
docs.text: Is project mein main Chickpea (Chana) ki breeding aur improvement par kaam kar raha hoon. Yeh project PARB ke under GBRSS Kalur Kot station par jaari hai, jahan mujhe research ka hands-on aur field-based experience mil raha hai.

docs.title: 🔬 Research Focus
docs.text:
Is project ke dauran main ne:

Chickpea ki breeding techniques ko practical tor par seekha 🌾

Yield traits, disease resistance aur growth parameters par kaam kiya

Mukhtalif chickpea varieties ki characterization ki

docs.title: 🦠 Disease Management
docs.text:
Chickpea mein aam diseases ki identification

Disease management strategies ko field level par samjha

Healthy crop production ke liye preventive measures seekhay

docs.title: 📊 Data Collection & Analysis
docs.text:
Field se accurate data collection ka experience 📋

Yield aur growth parameters ka record aur analysis

Research data ko properly organize aur interpret karna seekha

docs.title: 🌟 Key Learnings & Outcomes
docs.text:
Chickpea breeding aur improvement ka strong practical exposure

Research aur observation skills mein kaafi improvement

Field-based agricultural research ka real understanding

Yeh project mere liye legume crops research mein aik strong step hai, jo future mein data analysis aur AI-based agriculture solutions ke liye meri base ko aur strong banata hai 🌱🤖

docs.title: 🌱 NIAB Blackgram (Mashbean) Research Project
docs.text: During this project, I worked for two years at NIAB in collaboration with Dr. Azeem Asad (Principal Scientist) on Blackgram (Mashbean) research. This experience played a vital role in shaping my skills in plant breeding, data analysis, and scientific research.

docs.title: 🔬 Research Focus
docs.text:
Blackgram breeding and improvement

Yield-related traits analysis

Disease resistance evaluation

Study of key growth parameters

docs.title: 📊 Data Collection & Analysis
docs.text:
Hands-on experience in field data collection

Applied R programming for statistical analysis and visualization

Learned practical approaches to agricultural data analysis

docs.title: 🧠 Learning & Mentorship
docs.text:
Gained deep insights under the guidance of Dr. Azeem Asad

Learned how to:

Write a research thesis ✍️

Prepare research papers for publication 📄

Improved critical thinking, research design, and analytical skills

docs.title: 🌟 Key Outcomes
docs.text:
Strong improvement in data analysis & research skills

Practical understanding of Blackgram breeding systems

Exposure to a highly professional and learning-oriented research environment

This project significantly strengthened my foundation in plant breeding research and data-driven decision-making, and motivated me to further explore AI and data science applications in agriculture 🌾🤖

If you want, I can also:

Just tell me 👍

You said: thanks improve it in desi language style ChatGPT said: Bilkul 👍 Yeh raha aap ka same project, lekin desi / natural Roman-Urdu style mein, jo portfolio ke liye professional bhi lage aur apna-pan bhi ho, emojis ke sath 🌱✨

🌱 NIAB Blackgram (Mashbean) Research Project Is project mein main ne NIAB mein 2 saal tak Dr. Azeem Asad (Principal Scientist) ke sath mil kar Blackgram (Mashbean) par kaam kiya. Yeh experience mere liye bohat valuable aur learning-based raha, jahan mujhe research ka practical exposure mila.

🔬 Research & Breeding Experience Is project ke dauran main ne:

Blackgram ki breeding ko qareeb se samjha 🌾

Yield, disease resistance aur growth parameters par research ki

Field level par data collection ka real experience hasil kiya

📊 Data Analysis & Tools Data analysis ke liye R programming language use ki 📈

Statistical analysis aur data interpretation seekhi

Research data ko properly analyze aur present karna seekha

🧠 Learning & Guidance Dr. Azeem Asad ne mujhe bohat achi tarah guide kiya 🙏

Un ki guidance se main ne:

Thesis likhna seekha ✍️

Research paper writing ka practical tareeqa jana 📄

Research planning, analysis aur scientific thinking mein bohat improvement hui

🌟 Key Learnings & Outcomes Data analysis aur research skills bohat improve hui

Blackgram ke breeding system aur growth traits ka strong understanding bana

NIAB ka learning-friendly aur professional environment mujhe bohat inspire karta raha

Yeh project mere liye aik strong foundation bana plant breeding research aur data-driven agriculture mein, jis ne mujhe future mein AI aur Data Science ko agriculture ke sath integrate karne ka vision diya 🌾🤖

docs.title: Explaination of report in desi style language
docs.text: YDATA Profiling ka istemal karte hue, humne Farmer Advisor Dataset ka ek zabardast EDA report tayar kiya hai. Is report mein humne agriculture se judi kai important features ko analyze kiya hai, jaise ki soil properties, weather conditions, aur crop yields. Yeh profiling report aapko dataset ki structure, distributions, correlations, aur data quality issues ke baare mein samajhne mein madad karega. Is report ka maqsad stakeholders ko dataset ko behtar samajhne mein madad dena aur aise key insights identify karna hai jo agricultural practices aur decision-making ko inform kar sakein. YDATA Profiling library ka use karke, humne ek comprehensive overview tayar kiya hai jo asaani se samajh mein aata hai. Is profiling report mein yeh sections shamil hain: 1. Overview: Dataset ka ek summary, jisme variables, observations, aur missing values ki ginti shamil hai. 2. Variable Properties: Har variable ke detailed statistics, jisme data types, unique values, aur missing value counts shamil hain. 3. Distributions: Numerical aur categorical variables ke distributions ki visualizations. 4. Correlations: Numerical variables ke beech correlations ka analysis taake potential relationships identify kiye ja sakein. 5. Missing Values: Dataset mein missing data patterns ki visualization aur analysis. 6. Sample Data: Dataset ke pehle kuch rows ka preview. 7. Conclusion: Key findings aur recommendations based on the analysis.

docs.title: Conclusion in desi style language
docs.text: Is YDATA Profiling report ke zariye, humne Farmer Advisor Dataset ka ek gehrai se jaiza liya hai. Humne dekha ki kaunse variables sabse zyada important hain, unke distributions kaisay hain, aur unke beech kya correlations maujood hain. Is analysis se humein yeh bhi pata chala ki dataset mein kuch missing values hain, jinke baare mein humein aage chal kar sochna hoga. Humari recommendations yeh hain ke hum in insights ko use karte hue agricultural practices ko behtar bana sakte hain aur decision-making mein sudhaar laa sakte hain. Yeh report humare liye ek valuable resource sabit hogi jo humein future mein bhi madad karegi.

docs.title: her variable ke liye alag alag insights in desi style language
docs.text:
1. Soil Properties: Soil ki quality aur type ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse soil properties crops ki growth par sabse zyada asar daalti hain. Yeh insights farmers ko madad karenge apni zameen ki behtari ke liye sahi decisions lene mein.
  2. Weather Conditions: Humne weather data ka analysis karke dekha ki temperature, humidity, aur rainfall ka crops ki productivity par kya asar hota hai. Yeh insights farmers ko madad karenge apne crops ke liye behtar planning karne mein.
  3. Crop Yields: Crop yield data ka analysis karke, humne identify kiya ki kaunse factors sabse zyada yield ko affect karte hain. Yeh insights farmers ko madad karenge apne production ko maximize karne mein.
  4. Pest Incidence: Pest incidence data ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse conditions mein pests zyada active hote hain. Yeh insights farmers ko madad karenge apne crops ko pests se bachane ke liye sahi strategies banane mein.# Agriculture EDA by YDATA Profiling
  5. Fertilizer Usage: Fertilizer usage data ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse fertilizers sabse zyada effective hain. Yeh insights farmers ko madad karenge apne fertilizer usage ko optimize karne mein.
  6. Irrigation Practices: Irrigation data ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse irrigation methods sabse zyada efficient hain. Yeh insights farmers ko madad karenge apne water usage ko behtar banane mein.
  7. Market Prices: Market price data ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse factors market prices ko affect karte hain. Yeh insights farmers ko madad karenge apne crops ke liye behtar selling strategies banane mein.
  8. Farmer Demographics: Farmer demographics data ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse demographic factors farming practices ko influence karte hain. Yeh insights policymakers ko madad karenge targeted interventions design karne mein.
  9. Crop Rotation Practices: Crop rotation data ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse rotation practices soil health aur crop productivity ko behtar banati hain. Yeh insights farmers ko madad karenge sustainable farming practices apnane mein.
  10. Harvesting Techniques: Harvesting techniques data ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse techniques sabse zyada effective hain. Yeh insights farmers ko madad karenge apne harvesting processes ko optimize karne mein.
  11. Storage Methods: Storage methods data ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse methods crops ki quality aur shelf life ko behtar banate hain. Yeh insights farmers ko madad karenge apne storage practices ko improve karne mein.
  12. Transportation Logistics: Transportation data ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse logistics practices sabse zyada efficient hain. Yeh insights farmers ko madad karenge apne supply chain processes ko optimize karne mein.
  13. Government Policies: Government policies data ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse policies farming practices ko influence karte hain. Yeh insights policymakers ko madad karenge effective agricultural policies banane mein.
  14. Technological Adoption: Technological adoption data ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse technologies sabse zyada beneficial hain. Yeh insights farmers ko madad karenge apne farming practices mein modern technologies ko integrate karne mein.

docs.title: Market Researcher Dataset EDA Report in desi style language
Explaination of report in desi style language
docs.text: YDATA Profiling ka istemal karte hue, humne Market Researcher Dataset ka ek zabardast EDA report tayar kiya hai. Is report mein humne market research se judi kai important features ko analyze kiya hai, jaise ki consumer behavior, market trends, aur sales data. Yeh profiling report aapko dataset ki structure, distributions, correlations, aur data quality issues ke baare mein samajhne mein madad karega. Is report ka maqsad stakeholders ko dataset ko behtar samajhne mein madad dena aur aise key insights identify karna hai jo market research practices aur decision-making ko inform kar sakein. YDATA Profiling library ka use karke, humne ek comprehensive overview tayar kiya hai jo asaani se samajh mein aata hai. Is profiling report mein yeh sections shamil hain: 1. Overview: Dataset ka ek summary, jisme variables, observations, aur missing values ki ginti shamil hai. 2. Variable Properties: Har variable ke detailed statistics, jisme data types, unique values, aur missing value counts shamil hain. 3. Distributions: Numerical aur categorical variables ke distributions ki visualizations. 4. Correlations: Numerical variables ke beech correlations ka analysis taake potential relationships identify kiye ja sakein. 5. Missing Values: Dataset mein missing data patterns ki visualization aur analysis. 6. Sample Data: Dataset ke pehle kuch rows ka preview. 7. Conclusion: Key findings aur recommendations based on the analysis.

docs.title: Conclusion in desi style language
docs.text: Is YDATA Profiling report ke zariye, humne Market Researcher Dataset ka ek gehrai se jaiza liya hai. Humne dekha ki kaunse variables sabse zyada important hain, unke distributions kaisay hain, aur unke beech kya correlations maujood hain. Is analysis se humein yeh bhi pata chala ki dataset mein kuch missing values hain, jinke baare mein humein aage chal kar sochna hoga. Humari recommendations yeh hain ke hum in insights ko use karte hue market research practices ko behtar bana sakte hain aur decision-making mein sudhaar laa sakte hain. Yeh report humare liye ek valuable resource sabit hogi jo humein future mein bhi madad karegi.

docs.text:

  22. Feedback Analysis: Feedback data ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse feedback types sabse zyada actionable insights provide karte hain. Yeh insights businesses ko madad karenge apne feedback management processes ko optimize karne mein.
  23. Event Marketing: Event marketing data ka analysis karke, humne dekha ki kaunse events sabse zyada brand engagement generate karte hain. Yeh insights marketers ko madad karenge apni event marketing strategies ko behtar banane mein.
